reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, particularly for southern heat, and appreciate its fit, style, and quality. The fabric receives positive feedback for being made of mostly cotton, and customers describe it as flattering, with one noting how it gently contours to the body. The size and color receive mixed reviews - while some say the size is spot on, others find it too small, and while some love the color, others note the purple undertone. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: ok, this is an awesome dress! I don't write many reviews, but this dress is everything that all the other good reviews of it say. It is cotton, not thin cotton, but perfect weight, very well made, fit perfectly, has no funky smell to the fabric. It's beautiful. I am 5' 3" and 109 pds. I purchased it in size small. Got a thumbs up from my husband, said it was very flattering. So nice when there is so much cheap polyester clothing or cotton clothing that is so cheap you can see through it and too clingy. I can't say enough good things about it in the age of "fast fashion". Don't hesitate, just buy it if you like and you love good cotton clothing! Read more
items.author: Organic Fanatic

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Woman vibes & POCKETS!
items.body: Bought this dress for a Kentucky Derby themed Christmas party for my job. I was trying to give off Pretty Woman vibes with this dress and everyone absolutely adored the outfit, especially me! I am 5â€™8â€ and 165 lbs., D cup size, and I ordered a medium. The fit was perfect. No loose or tight areas. It arrived in a vacuum-sealed bag, so I would recommend ordering early enough to get the wrinkles out of it. It was definitely comfortable to wear for at least 5 hours and it was thick enough fabric. And honestly, the best thing about it, THE POCKETS! Read more
items.author: SunshineStateOfMind

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, beautiful fit and flare dress
items.body: One of my favorite dresses for Summer and mid season. Looks just like the Julia Robertâ€™s outfit for the polo game in â€œPretty Womanâ€! I always get compliments when wearing it. Bought the medium (5â€™5â€ for 142 lbs, 68 yrs old) and was impressed by the quality of the material. It looks very classy and washes well. I bought a second one (I wear it a lot!) to make sure it wouldnâ€™t disappear, and honestly couldnâ€™t tell the difference between the frequently washed one and the new one! Delighted with the brown one and also have the navy/white one! â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ðŸ¥° Read more
items.author: Julia T in Tennessee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great-looking, comfortable dress
items.body: I got this dress for an event honoring my wife. I received many compliments about how I look it in, and who doesn't love a good polka-dot pattern? The dress fit true-to-size, and the pockets are great. I could put all the things I normally keep in my pockets in them (phone and wallet on one side, keys, glasses, etc on the other) and they stayed securely in the pockets. The material is a good thickness, but not quite as soft as I would expected from 100% cotton, hence taking off one stare. I'm hoping it's just stiff from shipping and will improve over time. There's no lining in the chest area, which I consider a plus. Why stick in some polyester lining and ruin something that's all cotton? Moreover, even without the lining, it's not at all see through, so I think this dress is fine ever for more modest folk. Overall, this is a great value for the money. Read more
items.author: A guy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely gorgeous.
items.body: This is a gorgeous dress. It fits beautifullyâ€”like it was custom made. The fabric is comfortable and a little stretchy. It holds its shape nicely and the silhouette is very flattering. Annnd it has pockets! I would buy this dress in every color! Read more
items.author: Jen Grant

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Like the dress but will need to pay for alterations
items.body: Super cute dress. Except long in the torso area Read more
items.author: Diane Thomas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for any occasion
items.body: This dress is a great little form fitting dress. The color is okay but the Brown has a purple tint which makes the white dots look pinkish. Paired it with a light pale pink flat and it was perfect. Other than that, the dress is flattering and the material is thick and stretchy holding its shape. Iâ€™m a size two and it fits very very snug through the torso area, but I do have a large rib cage so I do account for that. I love this dress and have it in the black polka dot pattern and the white with black flowers pattern. All three dresses are well made and fit perfectly. The pockets are the bonus feature to this dress. Read more
items.author: S. Richardson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Utterly beautiful
items.body: This dress exceeded my expectations in every single way. The fit is delightful - comfortable, modest and elegant. The dress gives vintage vibes and looks perfectly pretty in every way. The bodice is lined so not at all transparent. The dress is A-line which is very nice. The fabric has a teeny bit of stretch but because it is true to size it isnâ€™t needed. The hem falls at tea-length which is versatile. The whole shebang is just perfect. Order it! Read more
items.author: Nikole

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 3363 Beige/White Dots, 3366 White/Black Flowers, 3370 Black/White, 2 Brown/White, 3366 Black/White Sketch Flower, Black&white Dots, 3368 Black/White Flower, 3363 Brown&white Flowers, 2 3361 Brown/White Flower, 2 Black/White Dot, 2 3341 White/Black, 3363 Black/Cherry Green Leaf, 3366 Blue/Red Flowers, Black&red Dots. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
